vsParam:
Ah, my... my name is Rorona,
I am an alchemist...

I lived in a place called "Arland".
A few days ago, there was a flare around me, and...

And then you came to this world, right?
Life is tricky for everyone, huh, [px]?
This is even more bizarre than a novel.

Um. Rorona, you said that you were also an alchemist,
so you went to school as well, huh?

Ah, we have a school called the Academy here.
It mainly teaches alchemy, wizardry and many other knowledge.

Oh...
There's no such thing as an alchemy school in my world.

I took my master's atelier without even figuring out the situation,
and I have been struggling to run it ever since...

Atelier!? So amazing!
Rorona, you already owns an atelier, at such a young age!?

What!? Yeah, sort of... But, the circumstance now is that
if I still can't make any achievement, it will just go down...

Gee, I see...
I am so sorry to drag you here at such a critical moment.

We will help you to find a way back,
but I don't think that's possible now.

So,
you may have to stay here for a while...

Ah, please don't apologize!
Visiting another world is also a very rare chance!

And, master will find a way
to keep the atelier alive!

My master is really something once she gets serious!
But, she rarely does...

Ha-ha... Anyway, maybe it's fate that brings us together.
Nice to meet you, Rorona!

O, okay!
Please kindly help and advice me!

Stop it, don't give her a hard time!
Just call [px] in a way you would with anyone else.

A, alright... I shall call you [px].
Everyone, nice to meet you!
